mapper.insert:
select s_client_import.nextval as id from dual
insert into LM_CLIENT_IMPORT (ID, CLIENT_NAME, TEL, STATION_NO, CITY, FROM_TYPE_BIG, FROM_TYPE, STATUS, CREATED_TIME, CREATED_USER_ID, UPDATED_TIME, UPDATED_USER_ID, REMARK, CHANNEL,ID_NO,CUSTOMER_MANAGER) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{clientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromTypeBig,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{customerManager,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update LM_CLIENT_IMPORT
CLIENT_NAME = #{clientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATION_NO = #{stationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FROM_TYPE_BIG = #{fromTypeBig,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FROM_TYPE = #{fromType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_TIME = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATED_USER_ID = #{createdUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UPDATED_TIME = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_USER_ID = #{updatedUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANNEL = #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update LM_CLIENT_IMPORT set CLIENT_NAME = #{clientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATION_NO = #{stationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FROM_TYPE_BIG = #{fromTypeBig,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FROM_TYPE = #{fromType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_TIME = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATED_USER_ID = #{createdUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UPDATED_TIME = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_USER_ID = #{updatedUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL = #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select count(id) from lm_client_import where tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select t.id ID, t.client_name NAME, t.from_type_big FROMTYPEBIG,t.from_type FROMTYPE
from lm_client_import t
and t.id in
#{obj,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
